Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The process tree model is structured with sequential and XOR operators, representing an Order-to-Cash flow with parallel and cancel paths.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Analyzed the logical flow of the process tree to identify its sequence and conditional paths.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Hypothesized that the problem lies in parallel execution of successful activities or incorrect handling of the cancel path.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Confirmed that activities in the parallel subtree must all be completed before Close Order.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Considered that the model might allow invalid sequences due to underfitting and insufficient constraints.

Name: Backtracking - NE
Text: Explored multiple hypotheses about potential flaws, such as improper sequencing of activities or reopening orders after cancellation.

Name: Counterfactual Reasoning - PE
Text: Assessed the logical impossibility of reopening an order after cancellation based on the modelâ€™s sequential structure.
